version_description: Thank you for your feedback! This update fixes a bug preventing some users from opening the app, as well as a bug that caused ads to crash the game. We're working around the clock to make gameplay as smooth as possible.  Happy playing!

Thanks again for your feedback! We've been working hard to bring you a smoother and more stable gameplay experience. More updates coming soon.

Thanks again for your feedback! We've been working hard to bring you a smoother and more stable gameplay experience. More updates coming soon.

Lots of good stuff in this update!
- We've added some BRAND NEW trivia to our free decks; Is That A Fact?, Word Up!, and Movie Bluff!
- The phone flip feature has been removed. You no longer need to flip your phone over while waiting on others to select an answer.
- Host devices can now browse and purchase new decks mid-game
- General bug fixes and updates

Lots of exciting things in this update!
    - You can now add Ellen to your games!
    - Check out the new “And the Truth Comes Out” deck, where you and your friends become part of the trivia!
    - General bug fixes and updates.

Did you know that Hollywood actress Hedy Lamarr was also an avid inventor and created what became modern-day Wi-Fi?

This update includes some new and exciting changes to the app’s layout, making it easier for you and your friends to start and join a game. We can’t wait to hear what you think!

Pro Tip: To see your decks and check out new ones, tap “Start a Game” from the main menu.
